aboutContent: My name is Jesse Leung.  I'm a Chinese American software engineer currently living in Tokyo, Japan.  In my career I've designed and contributed to the core systems of numerous large scale projects including high traffic forums, matchmaking websites, and iOS games.
I love coding and enjoy building projects during my free time.

Outside of work, I love cycling, cooking, and playing with my poodle, Seulgi.  I'm always looking for new opportunities to grow as a software engineer.  If you have a code-y, math-y (or Rust based) project in mind, please reach out!

resumePage.summary: An skilled software engineer with experience in fullstack web development, game development, and mentoring junior team members.

descriptions.title: Toresaka
bullets: Designed and implemented a tutorial management system, gacha system, and other game systems while maintaining code organization and ease of expansion
Conducted code reviews for team members and ensured code corectness, a uniform code style, and best practices to ensure the longevity and ease of development of the codebase.

descriptions.title: Konfused
bullets: Architected and built a performant rest API to be easily testable and expandable in the future.
Designed and implemented a modern frontend service to allow users to quickly find answers to their questions.
Wireframed and mapped the functionality of the application and outlined and implementation plan and tech stack.

descriptions.title: girls band cry (concept, prototype)
bullets: Expertly designing and implementing input system, event manager, and score manager to calculate and broadcast information about score, tap timing, and other core game functionality.
Diligently designing and building the song layout functionality to visually represent a song’s Json data.
Carefully adapting a Midi to Json converter which translated song files from the audio team into game-usable data.

descriptions.title: Muvluv
bullets: Implemented performant server functionality and designed API endpoints for a new event section of the game.
Refactored gacha server logic to improve readability, performance, and allow for easy modification of drop rates.
Implemented client side game logic and UI to for in game events.

descriptions.title: otakon and sibling sites
bullets: Designed and built a responsive, mobile friendly version of the admin dashboard to make emergency remote administration possible.

Reduced the loading time of a heavy admin page by over 30s by identifying slow SQL queries then restructuring database tables and restructuring client-side to eliminate time wasted by waiting JavaScript.
Wrote a script to convert user IDs and profile picture file names to random slugs to hide backend data from other users and make the site more secure.
Member of the Commonwealth Honors College
division 1 mens lacrosse (2016 - 2018)

descriptions.title: endureandsurvive.io
bullets: A small single page application to countdown to the release of The Last of Us hosted on AWS.

descriptions.title: gatsbycsstypes
bullets: An npm package to continuously find, parse, then generate TypeScript definition files for CSS Modules when using Gatsby JS.

projectsPage.summary: A selection of projects I've worked on in my free time.

descriptions.title: endureandsurvive.io
bullets: A small single page application to countdown to the release of The Last of Us hosted on AWS.

descriptions.title: Slack-translate
bullets: A slack service to translate messages using DeepL to improve communication within my international team.

descriptions.title: locality sensitive hashing in Rust
bullets: An implementation of locality sensitive hashing in Rust.  Designed to find a number of likely matches between user profiles on matchmaking services.

descriptions.title: gatsbycsstypes
bullets: An npm package to continuously find, parse, then generate TypeScript definition files for CSS Modules when using Gatsby JS.

descriptions.title: jesska.io
bullets: A dynamically routed and updated single page application built with React to showcase the Jesska series of comics.

descriptions.title: girls band cry (concept, prototype)
bullets: A concept and prototype for an upcoming rhythm rpg game built in C# and Unity.

descriptions.title: otakon and sibling sites
bullets: A family of niche matchmaking services built in Ruby and Rails and hosted on AWS.

descriptions.title: react application for aflac
bullets: A suite of complex forms built with React and TypeScript and structured following atomic design patterns.

descriptions.title: gundam: iron blooded orphans
bullets: A recently released iOS rpg, gacha, and battle game built in C# and Unity.

subtitle.part_3: .  Or, you can reach me through email.
